intro: You've played bowling like this before. Go for more!
description:
You already know, that bowling doesn't have to be played in a bowling alley on a straight track. You also discovered that you can use bombs or springs here.

Knock down more than just bottles! See what else you can do to have more fun. Find out how this game differs from classic bowling.

Check out the new levels — you might be surprised at how challenging they are!   

Check out the new fun game from the NOSTRA.GAMES team. 

Beat the new levels in one shot!
